title: Macau - Credit Rating
description: Moody's credit rating for Macau was last set at Aa3 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Macau was last reported at AA with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Macau thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Macau as reported by major credit rating agencies.
